name: Surrounded (itch) (BowieMine)
description:
Game Version - v0b18.4

This is a Scratch game, but it's too big to send on the website so I'm uploading it here, the multiplayer has a 3-player multiplayer mode, the game can be quite fun, the single player mode is not finished yet, the ending really isn't that finished up.

Kill zombies in the single-player or multi-player, have fun with weapon upgrades and do... stuff...
W, A, S, D to move, 1 to select primary, 2 to select secondary, Q to zoom out, R to reload current selected weapon, mouse to look around.

Downloading the game is much faster than playing it in the browser, it has more access to memory and cores in your CPU.

For the single-player mode; I'm going to add a unique boss zombie to my game, and I'm going to let my friends pick what it is, no matter how racial or OP the zombie is, I'm gonna have to add it :| (friend vote).
Stick around for when I add the round 99 BOSS ZOMBIE, It's going to be great!
